017package org.apache.commons.chain.web;
018
019import java.util.Locale;
020
021import org.apache.commons.chain.Command;
022import org.apache.commons.chain.Context;
023
024/**
025 * Abstract base {@link Command} implementation for retrieving the
026 * requested Locale from our {@link Context}, and storing it under the
027 * context attribute key returned by the {@code localeKey} property.
028 *
029 * @param <C> Type of the context associated with this command
030 *
031 * @author Craig R. McClanahan
032 * @version $Revision$ $Date$
033 */
034public abstract class AbstractGetLocaleCommand<C extends WebContext> implements Command<C> {
035
036    // -------------------------------------------------------------- Properties
037
038    /**
039     * The context attribute key used to store the {@code Locale}.
040     */
041    private String localeKey = "locale";
042
043    /**
044     * Return the context attribute key under which we will store
045     * the request {@code Locale}.
046     *
047     * @return The context attribute key of the request {@code Locale}.
048     */
049    public String getLocaleKey() {
050        return this.localeKey;
051    }
052
053    /**
054     * Set the context attribute key under which we will store
055     * the request {@code Locale}.
056     *
057     * @param localeKey The new context attribute key
058     */
059    public void setLocaleKey(String localeKey) {
060        this.localeKey = localeKey;
061    }
062
063    // --------------------------------------------------------- Command Methods
064
065    /**
066     * Retrieve the {@code Locale} for this request, and store it
067     * under the specified context attribute.
068     *
069     * @param context The {@link Context} we are operating on
070     *
071     * @return {@code false} so that processing will continue
072     *
073     * @throws Exception If an error occurs during execution.
074     */
075    @Override
076    public boolean execute(C context) throws Exception {
077        context.put(getLocaleKey(), getLocale(context));
078        return false;
079    }
080
081    // ------------------------------------------------------- Protected Methods
082
083    /**
084     * Retrieve and return the {@code Locale} for this request.
085     *
086     * @param context The {@link Context} we are operating on.
087     *
088     * @return The Locale for the request.
089     */
090    protected abstract Locale getLocale(C context);
091}
